sentences.en: After several reverses the enemy was forced to retreat.
sentences.cn: 几次失败后敌军被迫后撤.

sentences.en: Cockburn decided it was time to beat a hasty retreat.
sentences.cn: 科伯恩认为到了该紧急撤退的时候了。

sentences.en: He accused President Carter of vacillation and retreat.
sentences.cn: 他指责卡特总统的动摇和退缩。

sentences.en: He saw her and retreated, too shy to speak to her.
sentences.cn: 他看到她就躲开了，不好意思跟她讲话。

sentences.en: He spent yesterday hidden away in his country retreat.
sentences.cn: 他昨天躲在了他乡下的静养地。

sentences.en: He watched her retreating figure.
sentences.cn: 他看着她的身影渐渐远去。

sentences.en: I made a tactful retreat before they started arguing.
sentences.cn: 在他们开始争论前我机智地离开了.

sentences.en: In June 1942, the British 8th Army was in full retreat.
sentences.cn: 1942年6月,英国第八军全面撤退.

sentences.en: It's a retreat into the adolescence they never really had.
sentences.cn: 这是对他们从不曾真正拥有的青春时代的回归.

sentences.en: Napoleon’s retreat from Moscow
sentences.cn: 拿破仑从莫斯科的撤退

sentences.en: The army was forced to retreat after suffering heavy losses.
sentences.cn: 部队因伤亡惨重被迫撤退。

sentences.en: The bugler sounded the retreat (= gave a loud signal for retreat ) .
sentences.cn: 司号兵吹响撤退号。

sentences.en: The French, suddenly outnumbered, were forced to retreat.
sentences.cn: 人数突然处于劣势的法军被迫撤退。

sentences.en: The rebel forces are in full retreat (= retreating very fast ) .
sentences.cn: 叛军全线溃退。

sentences.en: The rebels retreated to the mountains.
sentences.cn: 叛乱分子撤退到山区。

sentences.en: The soldiers were ordered to retreat to safer positions behind the lines.
sentences.cn: 士兵们奉命撤退到后方较为安全的阵地上去.

sentences.en: Their soldiers had to retreat ignominiously after losing hundreds of lives.
sentences.cn: 损失数百人之后，他们的士兵被迫灰溜溜地撤退。

sentences.en: They decided to retreat lest they would be between two fires.
sentences.cn: 他们决定撤退,否则就要受两面夹击.

sentences.en: They knew when to attack and when to retreat.
sentences.cn: 他们知道什么时候进攻和什么时候撤退.

sentences.en: They were attacked and forced to retreat.
sentences.cn: 他们受到攻击，被迫撤退。

sentences.en: Yesterday'svote itself was a retreat from an earlier fallback position.
sentences.cn: 昨天的投票本身就是放弃先前所留退路的做法。

sentences.en: You cannot retreat from your responsibility in this affair.
sentences.cn: 你不能回避在这一事件中的责任.
